content: That's a great selection of mixers and garnishes! I think I'll also add some flavored simple syrups, like strawberry and mint, to give guests even more options. By the way, I learned how to make flavored simple syrups in my mixology class, where I also learned how to make a classic Daiquiri the right way, using fresh lime juice and simple syrup. It's amazing how many possibilities you can create with just a few ingredients!
